content.prompt: The shaded region in the figure above is bounded by the graph of y = cos ( π x 10 ) MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4451@  and the lines x = -7, x = 7, and y = 2. What is the area of this region?

topic.text: 8.4: Finding the Area Between Curves Expressed as Functions of x
